specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Washer Washer is a post-treatment mainly applied to woven fabrics with a sturdy structure. Through washing processes, it induces slight shrinkage and creates natural creases and streaks, adding a vintage-like appearance and texture to the fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Performance Cool Touch Cool Touch treatment is a finishing process that gives fabric a cool and refreshing feel. It helps absorb and dissipate heat and moisture quickly, keeping the wearer comfortable and dry in hot conditions. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Recommended Use Activewear
